root.name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes
root.description: OverviewThe first Marvel based LEGO game, this title ambitiously takes on the entirety of the Marvel universe. In a story created for the game, Loki desires the throne of Asgard once again, and has begun to build a team of super villains to help him accomplish this task, while at the same time, Galactus is on his way to Earth hoping to succeed in consuming it once and for all. Now the heroes of the Marvel universe must band together in order to put a stop to these massive threats to their planet.GameplayThis new title will play similarly to TT Games previous superhero game LEGO Batman 2: DC Super Heroes, but on a much larger scale than before. Gameplay will be fairly similar to other LEGO titles, with each hero and villain having their own unique way of fighting and solving puzzles. The game will have an Open World for the characters to explore, while also having level to level based missions as in previous LEGO games, as well as Side Quests and of course a large amount of unlockables and collectibles.CharactersLEGO Marvel Super Heroes will feature over 150 playable Marvel heroes and villains with a fully voiced cast.HeroesCharacterAlternate FormsWeapons/AbilitiesA-Bomb (DLC)Rick JonesSuper StrengthThunderclapCan create and throw rock massesWall SmashHazard ProtectionRoarCan transform between Jones and A-BombAgent Coulsonn/aThe DestroyerAnt-Mann/aShrinkArchangeln/aFlightRazor FeathersAunt Mayn/aHandbagBeastn/aClawsComputer HackingDigEnhanced SensesBeta Ray Bill (DLC)n/aStormbreakerFlightLightningThrow StormbreakerBlack Boltn/aFlightSonic ScreamTelekinesisBlack Panthern/aClawsBlack Widown/aGunsInvisibilityBladen/aSwordCaptain AmericaClassicShieldThrow ShieldActivate SlotsRedirect Enemy FireShield ProtectionCaptain Britainn/aFlightEnergy BlastsTelekinesisEnhanced SensesColossusn/aSuper StrengthFastball SpecialCyclopsAstonishingOptic BlastsDamage Controln/a Daredeviln/aBatonCan swing on poles with batonEnhanced SensesDeadpooln/aGunsKatanasDoctor Strangen/aMagicDrax the Destroyern/aSaiElektran/aSaiEmma Frostn/aDiamond SkinFalcon (DLC)n/aFlightRazor FeathersFandral (DLC)n/a Gambitn/aBo StaffEnergy Throwing CardsGamoran/a Ghost Ridern/aChainsShoot FirePenance StareGrootn/aSuper StrengthGwen Stacyn/a Havokn/a HawkeyeClassic (DLC)Bow ArrowSpecialty ArrowsHeimdalln/aSwordH.E.R.B.I.E.n/aShockHogun (DLC)n/a Howard the Duckn/aRocket LauncherHulkBruce BannerSuper StrengthCreate and throw rock massesWall SmashHazard ProtectionThunder ClapRoarTransform between Banner and HulkComputer Hacking (As Banner)Human TorchJohnny StormFlightFlame OnFire BlastFireballsIcemann/aIcebeamGlide on Ice PathIce BlastsInvisible WomanFuture FoundationCreate Force FieldInvisibilityTelekinetic BlastsIron Fistn/a Iron ManHeroic AgeMk.
